name: Lucky Charm (bee_and_frog, Corneey)
description:
In “Lucky Charm” you can experience a day in the life of a chimney sweep. Meet new people, clean chimneys and help out your neighbors.

Play a visual novel that advances through short vertical scroller levels and build a community by bringing your neighbors together for a garden party.

Game by Awkward Aardvarks - created for the Wholesome Games Jam 2022

Programming, Game Design - Corneey

Art, Narrative Design - Bee
